cals-set-cell-horizontal-alignment-left.label: t__Align left

cals-set-cell-horizontal-alignment-right.description: t__Align the content of the current cell to its right.

cals-set-cell-horizontal-alignment-cente.label: t__Align center
cals-set-cell-horizontal-alignment-cente.description: t__Center the content of the current cell.

cals-set-cell-horizontal-alignment-justi.description: t__Justify the content of the current cell.

cals-set-cell-vertical-alignment-top.label: t__Align top
cals-set-cell-vertical-alignment-top.description: t__Align the content of the current cell to its top.

cals-set-cell-vertical-alignment-bottom.label: t__Align bottom
cals-set-cell-vertical-alignment-bottom.description: t__Align the content of the current cell to its bottom.

__documentation.summary: Set the vertical alignment of this cell to the middle
